column2: As a Driver, I want to have the schedules properly assigned to make sure there is no conflict on traveling.
column21: Manage schedule to make sure no clash of date and time
column23: Manage schedule to make sure no buses is assigned to a different places at the same date and time.
column25: Manage schedule to make sure no more than 1 driver is assigned to two different buses for traveling on the same date.
